name: shimmer (itch)
description:
shimmer
	by alex
paged poetry with hyperlink navigation 
	(2016)hi friends.this is the final version of shimmer, a short twine piece of grim & gentle isolation.besides thorough edits from previous versions, there are also many more elements which change with each loop and now an actual ending too for you to enjoy.
	i would recommend playing in fullscreen mode. 
	thank you very much for reading, i appreciate it immensely. look after yourself ok.my itch.io page
